Name: Gunbeard
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with a Brace of Pistols, a Coat of Blades and a Ghost Tentacle.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

At the start of the Tactics Step, select a Friendly Formation within 6" of this model and roll a D6, on a 4+ models in the selected Formation may make 1 additional shot with any ranged weapons they are equipped with.
In the Melee Combat Step, whenever an enemy Formation attacks this model, for each hit roll 1 made by that Formation, that enemy Formation suffers 1 Ethereal Damage.
